comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Rhode Island Architecture, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
"Newport will see a lot of the New York Yacht Club on its annual cruise, which will sail into Newport Harbor Aug. 9, on Friday, and remain until the following Monday morning. This means a round of social activity ashore and afloat." 

-----From a New York Times story (June 30, 1912) on the upcoming summer social season at the resort town of Newport, R. I.
